description: Removal of condition 3 (relocation of community centre) of planning permission P/2011/5047 dated 11/09/2012 for Redevelopment of Phases 1 and 2 of the Rectory Park Estate regeneration scheme, comprising the demolition of garages and storage sheds to the eastern side of Rectory Park Avenue and 102 residential units located at 1 to 95 (odd); 2 to 26 (even); 214 to 220 (even); and 251 to 303 (odd) Rectory Park Avenue, and the re-location of a community centre (of a minimum gross external area of 178 sqm) and the erection of 160 new residential units (37 no. 1-bedroom, 84 no. 2-bedroom, 1 no. 3-bedroom flats and 8 no. 2-bedroom and 30 no. 3-bedroom houses), together with new and altered roads and footpaths, refuse and recycling storage, cycle storage, car parking for up to 108 vehicles, public and private amenity space and associated playspace and landscaping.
